questions.question: 1. The core cutter method can be used for gravels, boulders, or any other hard surface.
2. The field density of a natural soil deposit cannot be determined by_____ method.

explanations.a: The methods for determining field density are: sand replacement methodcore cutter methodwater displacement methodrubber balloon method. The oven-dry method is used for the determination of water content.

questions.question: 3. In its natural condition, a soil sample has a mass of 1.980 kg and a volume of 0.001 m3. After being completely dried in an oven, the mass of the sample is 1.800 kg. Specific gravity is 2.7. Unit weight of water is 10 kN/m3. The degree of saturation of soil is _____

explanations.a: It is a dirtect application of the formula.
